title: Roasted Sweet Potato Soup
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons cold pressed extra virgin olive oil', '2 red onions, quartered', '2kg sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into large chunks', 'sea salt', '2 litres vegetable stock', '150g raw macadamia nuts, soaked for 4-6 hours', 'extra whole raw macadamia nuts for garnish', 'freshly chopped coriander to serve']
